attributes.action: Reward Foster Mum with a Damehood
attributes.additional_details: Doreen Roberts of Somerset has been a foster carer for over 47 years and has given over 300 young needy children a loving and safe home when in need, day or night She is still fostering even that she will be 78 year's old in October. She has saved the taxpayer in today's money over £25 million by keeping so many kids out of very costly Children's Homes..Fostering is in real crisis in the UK and by David Cameron awarding this amazing lady with this high honor would give fostering some real good PR and help his BIG SOCIETY Project
